events.message: The applicant submitted the personal loan application online to cover upcoming medical expenses and some outstanding debts.
The loan application was categorized under Personal Loan based on the keywords related to medical and debt repayment purposes.
A loan officer was assigned promptly to assist the applicant in navigating the personal loan process and gathering necessary information.
The initial review of the application began, focusing on the applicant’s financial background and stated purpose to ensure eligibility and risk evaluation.
The applicant was asked to provide proof of income, medical bills, and debt statements to support the details mentioned in the personal loan request.
All requested documents including recent pay slips, medical invoices, and credit card statements were submitted by the applicant for further assessment.
The credit check was performed, revealing a reasonable credit score and payment history suitable for the requested personal loan amount.
Risk assessment concluded with a moderate risk rating, considering the applicant’s current debt-to-income ratio and medical expense justification.
A loan offer with competitive interest rates and flexible repayment terms was presented to the applicant for consideration.
Applicant acknowledged the offer positively and requested clarification about early repayment penalties and monthly installment options.
The application was escalated to the senior loan manager to address applicant’s specific queries regarding the loan terms.
The senior loan manager approved the personal loan application after clarifying terms and confirming applicant’s eligibility.
The approved loan amount was disbursed to the applicant’s nominated bank account to cover the medical bills and pay off debts as planned.
Follow-up was conducted to ensure the applicant received the funds and to offer assistance with any questions related to repayment schedules.
The personal loan application case was closed successfully after confirming all formalities were completed and the applicant was satisfied.
